content:
Microsoft.VisualBasic.Activities Namespace

Definition

Provides classes related to Visual Basic activities.h

In this Article

Classes

VisualBasic

Provides an attached property store for VisualBasicSettings.
VisualBasicDesignerHelper

Creates and compiles crosoft.VisualBasic.Activities.VisualBasicReference`1 and crosoft.VisualBasic.Activities.VisualBasicValue`1 expressions.
VisualBasicImportReference

Represents an assembly reference and the namespace imported from that assembly.
VisualBasicReference<TResult>

Contains an expression in Visual Basic syntax that evaluates to an l-value, which supports binding of the ArgumentDirection arguments.
VisualBasicSettings

Contains settings that crosoft.VisualBasic.Activities.VisualBasicValue`1 and crosoft.VisualBasic.Activities.VisualBasicReference`1 instances use to compile the source text of the expressions they contain.
VisualBasicValue<TResult>

Contains an expression in Visual Basic syntax that evaluates to an r-value, which supports binding of ArgumentDirection arguments.
